Pick up phone
A friend told me he would call me the next day to discuss some business matter. The bell started ringing and I walked towards the table and grabbed the phone and discussed the matter.


[WALK] <home_office> (1.319)
[WALK] <table> (1.355)
[FIND] <phone> (1.1000)
[GRAB] <phone> (1.1000)
[DROP] <phone> (1.1000)
